rows.label: tlk4440008601_msg0001
rows.name:
My concoction... It was a perfect
success...but it was TOO perfect!

rows.label: tlk4440008601_msg0002
rows.name:
My beloved drank the love
potion, as intended...

rows.label: tlk4440008601_msg0003
rows.name:
But moments later, a Nopon walking
by tripped and cried out, and his
gaze was drawn to her...

rows.label: tlk4440008601_msg0004
rows.name:
And he's had eyes only for her
ever since! For a Nopon woman,
married with children!!!

rows.label: tlk4440008601_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm proud to have created such
a potent brew, but this is not
the result I had hoped for...
